name: brand-standards
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.copy-plugin-files: mkdir -p ./build && cp -r ./vendor ./build/ && cp -r ./includes ./build/ && cp -r ./secure ./build/ && cp -r ./templates ./build/ && cp -r ./assets ./build/ && cp -r ./css ./build/ && cp ./*.php ./build/
scripts.plugin-zip: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-plugin-files && npm run prepare-zip && cd zip-build && zip -r ../brand-standards.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf zip-build
